initial_question.title: 训练很慢
initial_question.body: finetune的时候，很慢，有办法提高速度吗？我是固定几个目标的检测，是不是text的特征可以预先生成好？

satisfaction_conditions: Training speed must be improved compared to baseline
Text feature processing efficiency is optimized
Solution remains compatible with the existing model architecture

initial_question.title: 微调时的训练过程图
initial_question.body: 您好，想请问一下在coco数据集上微调时，有没有支持查看训练过程的参数（tensorboard类似的）？

satisfaction_conditions: Real-time or near real-time monitoring capability exists
Training metrics visualization tool is properly configured
Training process generates compatible logging data

initial_question.title: how to take image feature as prompt ?
initial_question.body: use CLIP image encode is ok ?

satisfaction_conditions: The system must correctly handle image-based prompts according to model capabilities
The solution must clearly communicate supported prompt types
The response must address the specific capability of using CLIP image encodings
